channel.title: Error while loading client rep++ for help
channel.description:
when trying to load chozen pkz client i get the following error on the cmd:
java.io.IOException: Server returned HTTP response code: 502 for URL: http://equ inox-rsps.com/cache.zip at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLCon nection.java:1305) at CacheDownloader.downloadFile(CacheDownloader.java:105) at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:75) at client.startUp(client.java:7174) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4674) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Press any key to continue . . .
i looked at line 7174 on client.java and it said this: aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_1075 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(class44_2, "mapdots", 1);
so the error must be in that file or have something to do with that file.
unfortunately i am not experienced with client and have no idea what to do.
what do i do?

item.title: Error while loading client rep++ for help
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

when trying to load chozen pkz client i get the following error on the cmd:

java.io.IOException: Server returned HTTP response code: 502 for URL: http://equ
inox-rsps.com/cache.zip
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLCon
nection.java:1305)
at CacheDownloader.downloadFile(CacheDownloader.java:105)
at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:75)
at client.startUp(client.java:7174)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
at client.run(client.java:4674)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
Press any key to continue . . .

i looked at line 7174 on client.java and it said this: aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_1075 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(class44_2, “mapdots”, 1);

so the error must be in that file or have something to do with that file.

unfortunately i am not experienced with client and have no idea what to do.

what do i do?
